name: FACEBOOK - Blue, No Ads!, Wide Screen
description:
Let your Facebook make better use of your widescreen!
This script organises the layout to fit perfectly on a 1366x768 (laptop standard) resolution as well as setting the theme to a cool, relaxing blue one.
additional_info: At the current point in time I have only tested this script with Chrome running Stylish.

discussions.name: Not Working propely on Firefox.
discussions.author_name: Facebook Blue, No ads, wide screen is working very

discussions.name: add a review for this style
I like it, but you cant distinguish between new and old items on the 'world' dropdown
